Pre-Game Insights: India and Sri Lanka are set to lock horns in the third and final match of the three-match ODI series on Wednesday, August 7.
India, led by Rohit Sharma, have not had the best of times in the series thus far.
Indian batting suffered collapses both times despite Rohit Sharma giving them flying starts.
India went 1-0 down in the series after losing by 32 runs.
India are still looking for their 100th ODI win against the Islanders.
The pitch in Colombo has been helpful for the bowlers.
Spinners have got a lot of assistance.
Targets of around the 250-run mark can be tough to chase down.
Teams should opt to field first after winning the toss.
There will be a chance of rain on Wednesday from 2 PM onwards.
Temperatures will be around the 30-degree Celsius mark.
Sri Lanka have been excellent thus far in the ODI series against a decent Indian team.
If their bowlers stay in form, there is no reason why they cannot win the third game.
Prediction: Sri Lanka to win the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India and Sri Lanka have faced each other 170 times in Men’s ODIs since their first meeting back in 1979.
Two ODIs ended in tie while 11 ODIs did not produce a result.
Others: Sri Lanka vs India Match Details: Match: Sri Lanka vs India, 3rd ODI, India tour of Sri Lanka, Date and Time: August 7, 2024, 02:30 pm IST, Venue: R Premadasa Stadium, Colombo.

Sri Lanka vs India Probable XIs: Sri Lanka: Pathum Nissanka, Avishka Fernando, Kusal Mendis (wk), Sadeera Samarawickrama, Charith Asalanka (c), Kamindu Mendis, Janith Liyanage, Dunith Wellalage, Akila Dananjaya, Asitha Fernando, Jeffrey Vandersay. India: Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul (wk), Shivam Dube, Washington Sundar, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Mohammed Siraj, Arshdeep Singh.
